title: Maksim Sukrutin
text:
Maksim Aleksandrovich Sukrutin (; born 29 September 1987) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Lada%20Togliatti">FC Lada Togliatti</a> in 2006.
